name: Ouija Destiny
description:
Made for my very first game at the Narrascope 2020 game jam! And really...my very first game at all.

You are a ghost who has had the horrible luck of being summoned by some dumb teens performing a seance. How will you deal with them? Will you find out secrets about your own past?

The answer to the second question is no...as the narrator got far too lazy to pursue most options...for now...duh duh DUUUUUH (for the uninformed, that means there might be more later!)
